snippet: Undocumented students should get the same kind of financial assistance now given to legal residents.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York lawmakers to support proposal that would provide undocumented students the same kind of financial assistance for state colleges that is afforded to legal residents; argues proposal is politically opportune and the right thing to do for children who were brought to country illegally.
lead_paragraph: Undocumented students should get the same kind of financial assistance now given to legal residents.
